metadata.synopsis: Player reads Cazador's notes about different factions and powers in Baldur's Gates. The notes contain his thoughts about expanding his influence and taking over some factions.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe cp_cryptclick on the book called "|Power Structure of Baldur's Gate. Cazador's notes.|"

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Factions, nobles, politicians - he had information on everyone. If he'd ascended, the city would have been his in a tenday.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Details of who pulls every string in Baldur's Gate. Just what a powerful vampire needs to make this city his puppet.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Thank you, my dearly-departed master. I'll put it to good use.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: Guilds, nobles, politicians - if he controlled even a fraction of these, the city could be his and no one would ever know.
